svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Taxes on income vs. taxes on goods and services, 2013
Total taxes on income (individual and corporate) vs. total taxes on goods and services (including VAT and sales
taxes). Each dot on the plot is a different country, and world regions are color-coded.
